channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- Kyma
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- Kyma

item.title: CVE-2021-38182|2024-08-04T01:37:16.116Z -- sap%20se -- kyma
item.description: Due to insufficient input validation of Kyma, authenticated users can pass a Header of their choice and escalate privileges which can completely compromise the cluster.
